text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf has a Twinkle Series<n>race coming up this
weekend, which<n>gives me an idea...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What, you want me to go see Prez<n>race?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Normally I wouldn't miss it for the<n>world, but... Now, I dunno.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: No, wait... Mm...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
She'll win again, just like she always<n>does. And everyone
will cheer for her,<n>like they always do.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
If I see her again... the same Prez<n>who's always inspired
me, will this<n>weird stinging in my chest go away?
choice_data_list: Why don't we go find out together?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay. Yeah, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The weekend arrives before long, and<n>with it, Symboli
Rudolf's race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The crowd roars in excitement.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf in the lead! Rudolf's<n>fast, too fast! Three
lengths, now four,<n>the gap keeps widening!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And Symboli Rudolf crosses the<n>finish! Such dominance!
Ladies and<n>gentlemen, your emperor, Symboli<n>Rudolf!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: All hail the emperor!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Well... She's amazing, obviously.<n>She's strong, and fast,
and the<n>coolest runner ever.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I need to tell her something. Will you<n>come with me?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Excuse us!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh hello, Teio. And our trainer friend,<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm surprised. Usually, you burst right<n>in, a veritable ball of
energy. I've<n>never known you to give the door a<n>proper
knock.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, well... I'm here to talk about<n>something serious this
time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: All right... Let's hear it, then.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Prez, you're my role model. You're<n>the coolest racer ever,
and everything<n>I could ever dream to be.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I saw people praise how<n>incredible you are, it
would make me<n>happy too.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I saw you standing before<n>a cheering crowd with
a smile, it would<n>make me excited too.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
But not anymore... Or at least, that's<n>not the only feeling I
get now.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh? Care to elaborate, Teio?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
When I lost our race, and saw you in<n>front of that cheering
crowd...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I... I got this really, really painful ache<n>in my chest.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: An ache?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. It stung so bad, and I just<n>wanted to scream, so I
tried to run off<n>all those feelings... But they didn't go<n>
away.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Weird, I know. It makes no sense. But<n>after seeing you win
today, I get it<n>now.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I... I want to be the number one racer.That's why I run.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So all those cheers... I don't want togive those up to anyone. Anyone.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I want them all for myself. I can't let<n>anyone else take them,
not even you!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I want to be like you, Prez. That<n>hasn't changed. You're still
my role<n>model.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But who I really want tobecome... is someone even you'llrecognize as the best, someone evenyou'll want to cheer for.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Which brings me, Prez, to the super<n>serious part! I'm here
to declare war!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Then leave nothing unsaid, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Right... One day, I'm going to become<n>the king of kings, a
Monarch to<n>surpass even the almighty Emperor!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So you better watch out, Prez!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
So you leave the stands, and take to<n>the turf... to join me on
the same<n>stage. I am glad, Teio.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But Symboli Rudolf will not cede her<n>throne so easily. You
have a long road<n>ahead of you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Tokai Teio nod with all her<n>usual energy puts a smile
on Symboli<n>Rudolf's face.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Whew, I said it. I really said it! Hehe,<n>my heart's still
pounding.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for being there for me. Also,<n>um... Just, thanks a
bunch!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And... Let's kick some butt together,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, don't make me spell it out!<n>You'll need to be
sharper than that to<n>be my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Don't forget who we're trying to<n>beat—Prez, the strongest
racer ever. So<n>get your act together, Trainer!
choice_data_list: W-will do! We'll both give it our all!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yep! All right, now I've made my<n>declaration, and I've got a
trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Here begins the legend of the<n>invincible Teio!
